thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location & excellent service
thread.title_full: Excellent location & excellent service - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Josie679
title: Excellent location & excellent service
text: The location of this hotel speaks for itself, right near the Pantheon. There are great views of the square from the room & luckily there was not too much noise during bedtime hours. The staff was friendly, very courteous and provided much useful information including directions & restaurant recommendations. The rooms were very comfortable & clean as was the whole property. There is also a very small bar for hotel guests on the ground floor. We were extremely pleased with our short stay at the Albergo del Senato.
